title: Dynamic hydrogel used to make 'soft robot' components and LEGO-like building blocks

title_detail.value: Dynamic hydrogel used to make 'soft robot' components and LEGO-like building blocks

summary: A new type of hydrogel material could soon make assembling complex microfluidic or soft robotic devices as simple as putting together a LEGO set.

summary_detail.value: A new type of hydrogel material could soon make assembling complex microfluidic or soft robotic devices as simple as putting together a LEGO set.
